refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in No messages -odac -iadc -d ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o FLbutton.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 nchnls = 1
FLpanel "Button Bank", 520, 140, 100, 100 ;itype = 2 ;Light Buttons itype = 22 ;Plastic Light Buttons inumx = 10 inumy = 4 iwidth = 500 iheight = 120 ix = 10 iy = 10 iopcode = 0 istarttim = 0 idur = 1
gkbutton, ihbb FLbutBank itype, inumx, inumy, iwidth, iheight, ix, iy, iopcode, 1, istarttim, idur
FLpanelEnd FLrun
instr 1 ibutton = i(gkbutton) prints "Button %i pushed!\\n", ibutton endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
; Real-time performance for 1 hour. f 0 3600 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
